Uses of Interface
org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn

  • Packages that use CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms
    Defines PTransforms for transforming data in a pipeline.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.util
    Defines utilities that can be used by Beam runners.

    • Uses of CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms

      Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms that implement CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Combine.KeyedCombineFn<K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT>
      A KeyedCombineFn<K, InputT, AccumT, OutputT> specifies how to combine a collection of input values of type InputT, associated with a key of type K, into a single output value of type OutputT.
      static class  CombineFns.ComposedKeyedCombineFn<DataT,K>
      A composed Combine.KeyedCombineFn that applies multiple KeyedCombineFns.
      static class  CombineFns.ComposedKeyedCombineFnWithContext<DataT,K>
      A composed CombineWithContext.KeyedCombineFnWithContext that applies multiple KeyedCombineFnWithContexts.
      static class  CombineWithContext.KeyedCombineFnWithContext<K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT>
      A keyed combine function that has access to PipelineOptions and side inputs through CombineWithContext.Context.
      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms that return CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <K> CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn<K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT> CombineFnBase.GlobalCombineFn.asKeyedFn()
      Converts this GloballyCombineFn into an equivalent CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn that ignores the keys passed to it and combines the values according to this GloballyCombineFn.
      CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn<? super K,? super InputT,?,OutputT> Combine.PerKey.getFn()
      Returns the CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn used by this Combine operation.
      CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn<? super K,? super InputT,?,OutputT> Combine.GroupedValues.getFn()
      Returns the KeyedCombineFn used by this Combine operation.
      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms with parameters of type CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <K,InputT,OutputT>
      Combine.GroupedValues<K,InputT,OutputT>      		 Combine.groupedValues(CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn<? super K,? super InputT,?,OutputT> fn)
      Returns a Combine.GroupedValues PTransform that takes a PCollection of KVs where a key maps to an Iterable of values, e.g., the result of a GroupByKey, then uses the given KeyedCombineFn to combine all the values associated with each key.
      static <K,InputT,OutputT>
      Combine.PerKey<K,InputT,OutputT>      		 Combine.perKey(CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn<? super K,? super InputT,?,OutputT> fn)
      Returns a Combine.PerKey PTransform that first groups its input PCollection of KVs by keys and windows, then invokes the given function on each of the key/values-lists pairs to produce a combined value, and then returns a PCollection of KVs mapping each distinct key to its combined value for each window.
      <InputT,OutputT>
      CombineFns.ComposedKeyedCombineFnWithContext<DataT,K>      		 CombineFns.ComposedKeyedCombineFnWithContext.with(SimpleFunction<DataT,InputT> extractInputFn, CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn<K,InputT,?,OutputT> perKeyCombineFn, TupleTag<OutputT> outputTag)
      Returns a CombineFns.ComposedKeyedCombineFnWithContext with an additional CombineFnBase.PerKeyCombineFn.
